title: Le Somnambuliste
overview: In the heart of the vineyards, the village of Westheim is terrorized by a criminal escalation. Waking up in incongruous places, Simon, a lost thirty-something living with his mother, thinks he is the victim of a conspiracy ... or of sleepwalking. Hunted by a murderous duo, cornered by his lies to the police and his relatives, he soon sees reality and nightmares intertwine.
